Our Partners

We work with the best names in motorsport suspension and data acquisition.

Penske Racing Shocks

The Choice of Champions

Penske Racing Shocks has been at the forefront of motorsport damper technology for over 50 years. From Formula 1 to NASCAR, IndyCar to Le Mans – Penske dampers have won at the highest levels of motorsport.

We're proud to work with Penske dampers and offer their products to our customers. The Penske 7500 series is particularly well-suited to lightweight sports cars like Caterhams, offering the same technology used in professional racing in a package that fits the Seven platform.

Our Penske Services:

  • Sales of Penske damper kits
  • Custom valving and specification
  • Service and rebuild
  • Application development

Nitron Racing Systems

British Engineering Excellence

Nitron Racing Systems is a British manufacturer producing high-quality race and performance dampers. Their products are designed, developed, and manufactured in the UK – making them a natural fit for British sports car applications.

The Nitron NTR range offers exceptional performance at competitive price points. We particularly recommend the NTR1 40mm for Caterham applications – it's a robust, well-engineered damper that responds well to our custom valving.

Our Nitron Services:

  • Full range of Nitron dampers
  • Digressive piston upgrades
  • Service and revalving
  • Setup consultation

Hyperco Springs

Precision Spring Technology

Hyperco manufactures high-performance racing springs using advanced materials and manufacturing processes. Their springs maintain consistent rate under repeated compression cycles – essential for predictable handling.

We spec Hyperco springs for applications where spring quality and consistency matter. For serious track use and racing, they're the benchmark for coilover springs.

Our Hyperco Services:

  • Spring selection and specification
  • Custom rate combinations
  • Complete spring packages

Eibach Springs

Performance Springs Since 1951

Eibach has been manufacturing high-quality performance springs for over 70 years. From OEM supplier to motorsport specialist, their springs are trusted worldwide.

We use Eibach springs as standard on many of our builds. They offer excellent quality, wide availability, and consistent performance – everything you need from a coilover spring.

Our Eibach Services:

  • Spring supply and specification
  • Rate selection for your application
  • Helper spring packages

AiM Sports

Data Acquisition & Displays

AiM produces professional-grade data acquisition systems and displays. From club racing to professional motorsport, their products help drivers and engineers understand and improve performance.

We use AiM equipment for our own development work and chassis setup services. Data logging lets us see exactly what's happening with the suspension – information that drives our setup decisions.

Our AiM Services:

  • Data logging setup and support
  • Suspension analysis using logged data
  • Driver coaching and data review

Why Partnerships Matter

We've chosen to work with these brands because they represent the best in their respective fields. When you come to us for suspension work, you're getting components and expertise that's proven at the highest levels of motorsport.

Our relationships with these manufacturers give us access to technical support, development resources, and the latest products. That knowledge flows directly into the work we do for you.

Need Help Choosing?

Not sure which brand or product is right for you? Get in touch – we'll help you find the best solution for your application and budget.
